snippet: The Korean pop song was not available on Vevo for much of the year because of licensing restrictions, and so does not appear on its Top 10 list for 2012. Also, Warner Music reports that a rise in digital revenue more than offset a decline in CD...
abstract: The Korean pop song was not available on Vevo for much of the year because of licensing restrictions, and so does not appear on its Top 10 list for 2012. Also, Warner Music reports that a rise in digital revenue more than offset a decline in CD sales.

headline.main: On Vevo, 'Gangnam Style' Is the Viral Video That Never Was
